dublinCore.dc:title: 118 HR 251 IH: To name the Department of Veterans Affairs outpatient clinic in Vallejo, California, as the “Delphine Metcalf-Foster VA Clinic”.
dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Garamendi (for himself and Mr. Thompson of California) introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Veterans' Affairs

form.official-title: To name the Department of Veterans Affairs outpatient clinic in Vallejo, California, as the Delphine Metcalf-Foster VA Clinic.

section.header: Name of Department of Veterans Affairs outpatient clinic, Vallejo, California
section.text: The Department of Veterans Affairs outpatient clinic in Vallejo, California, shall after the date of the enactment of this Act be known and designated as the Delphine Metcalf-Foster VA Clinic. Any reference to such clinic in any law, regulation, map, document, record, or other paper of the United States shall be considered to be a reference to the Delphine Metcalf-Foster VA Clinic.
